alert.note: Alert for Nuckolls; Thayer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nuckolls and southwestern Thayer Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ruskin, or 22 miles northwest of Belleville, and was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Superior, Deshler, Nelson, Hardy, Ruskin, Byron and Nora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
